ComicInfo.Title: Nikki's Obsession; How Don Met Kat; Party Crashers; Amy And The Magic Paddle Factory
ComicInfo.Summary:
Nikki's Obsession: Nikki becomes obsessed with seducing Officer Hughe because she thinks Skyler is interested in him.
How Don Met Kat: Scenes from when Don and Kat were first dating.
Party Crashers: The Skunk Sisters crash a Halloween party and behave with their usual lack of manners.
Amy And The Magic Paddle Factory: A woman tells a young girl a bedtime story about a woman who wouldn't eat her vegetables and the consequences she faced.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:25. [Issue ID 248477]
ComicInfo.Writer: Robin Lane,Karri Aronen,James Hardiman,Joe Rosales,Brian Sutton
